name: Cleveland Clinic Children's Hospital for Rehabilitation

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cleveland Clinic Children's Hospital for Rehabilitation is a Rehabilitation Hospital  Children provider based in Cleveland, OH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $36.4M in Medicaid payments across 149K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $36.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
